reporting_cycle: The Secretary-General reports every 90 days, and submit to the Security Council, no later than 15 October 2011 and 26 January 2012
summary:
Requests UNMIT to fully consider gender considerations and to strengthen the responsiveness of the security sector to women's specific needs.

 Requests the Secretary-General to ensure UNMIT's compliance with the zero-tolerance policy on sexual exploitation and abuse.

 Requests the Secretary-General to keep the Security Council informed of developments and to submit reports on the transition and planning for the UN presence post-2012.

 Reaffirms the importance of the medium-term strategy and benchmarks for measuring progress in Timor-Leste and assessing the level and form of UN support.

 Encourages intensification of discussions on the strategy and modalities for transition and preparation for future changes to the UN presence.

 Decides to remain seized of the matter.
